name: User Needs Kit
description:
Want to align your team around your users' needs to build better products and features? User Needs Kit will help you organize your users' needs in a methodical way following UX research standards, while still being able to involve your team asynchronously.

Following this methodology, which combines value-based sorting and grouping general discussion and dot voting, User needs Kit helps you put your user at the front of your upcoming product priorities to make sure you build something they will love.

For feature requests or recommendations, please reach out on Twitter to @jvrlvs.

This was deeply inspired by @mixpanel's Feedback Kit. Huge kudos to them for introducing these kit styles to Figma!
